name: The 3rd International Conference on Gerontology and Geriatrics Medicine 2021 (SilverAge 2021)
content: Call for The 3rd International Conference on Gerontology and Geriatrics Medicine invites you to submit your research papers and case studies on or before 25th August 2021 to present online. The conference theme is “Adding Holistic Quality Care for the Silver Aged” The following are the conference tracks for abstract submission. Aged Care Services Theories of Ageing Dementia & Ageing Ageing & Mental Well-Being Elderly Friendly Environment Ageing Case Studies Ageing & Clinical Trials Innovations & Ageing Ageing & Palliative Care Ageing & Disability Ageing & Gerontology Elder Abuse Prevention Nutrition Aspects of Ageing Please click this link for more information https://silverageconference.com/call-for-papers/
